title: ERROR after complete re install of windows and league
body:
I have restarted my computer from image and re installed league.
I have completed the support page check list of possibles.
Here is my errors
0xc000012f C:\Riot Games\League of legends\bugSplat.dll is either not designed to run on windows or it contains an error. Try installing the program again asing the original installation medio or contact your sustem adman or the software vendor for support error status
C:\Riot Games \League of legends\libcurl.dll
Libssl1_1.dll
libcrypto-1_1.dll

replies.body:
Both of which I have done. 
NOw I am risking my computer for apcrepairkit
Do you need the logs from hextech?

The error is a 0xc000012f error

This issue can happen if your security settings aren't allowing your game files to be read, not necessarily that it's missing.  Firstly, make sure your Windows is up to date just to make sure it has the most recent products and settings.  You'll then want to go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league is being added as an extension.

Should another reinstall be necessary, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to process it that quickly!  I hope that helps!
